• It's simple to make a widget •

You don't need to be a professional designer, you just need to know what you want. Once you figure that out, it's a matter of letting your creativity flow. Just add an element, pick a data source, throw on some effects, and put it where you want. Then repeat to add another element. After a while, you'll have a perfect widget, and all you need to do is to assign it to a widget slot and drop it on your home screen. There it is, marvelous! 

The Widgy editor only has two parts. The preview and the layer list. When editing a layer, you get a couple of different sections that let you tweak the appearance and data of that layer. Each section has several special things you can do to the layer. The Preview will always show you a live display of exactly how the widget will look on your home screen, so you don't have to constantly go back and forth between the editor and home screen.

• Everything you need •

Widgy provides all the different elements that you would ever need to make your widget perfect. Along with that, there are all the data sources you could ever need, everything from system info to weather. • There's no limits •

This isn't an app full of templates, everything is 100% customizable and interchangeable. It's your widget, and you choose how to make it. The only limit is your imagination.

SCANNING
If you choose to scan with the Qlone mat, simply print it from the included mat file, place your object in the middle of the mat and let the AR dome guide you through the scanning process. You can also scan the object from two different angles and it will be automatically merged for a better overall result which includes areas such as the bottom of the object.
You can now also scan without a mat in two different modes - AR mode which makes it easy to scan with our familiar AR dome or Photo mode, which takes higher quality 4K images in both manual or automatic modes.
 
When scanning with the mat, there is no waiting time, all processing is done in real time on your phone in seconds. In the new option to scan without a mat, processing is done in minutes on our blazing fast Qlone Cloud but we value your privacy so we don't store or view any of your models!

MODIFYING
With the integrated tools in the app you can optimize and modify your 3D model without needing to export them to other sophisticated software.
 
Texture - Change the Brightness, Saturation and Sharpness of the 3D model. Pick colors from the scanned object and apply them by painting directly on the 3D model. Blur areas or transitions for smoother results.
Clean - Fill holes in the model, erase unwanted areas such as the background surface or smooth certain parts. 
Sculpt - Improve or alter the shape of your object by pressing or pulling a selected area and adjust the transition.
Shape - Fix the orientation, enhance the mesh details or set the scale size of your model for 3D printing. You can also simplify the mesh for lower file size export.
Art - Turn your object into scaled cubes or meshed objects of art, ready to be printed.

EXPORTING and IMPORTING:

没有内测，没有邀请码，没有门槛或限制，我们曾被 AI 艺术所打动，也希望将这份奇妙的体验直接带给所有人，6pen 可能不完美，但任何人，都可以直接下载并使用起来。

## 不保留版权
6pen 不保留任何版权，生成的图片版权都归属生成者，可随意自用商用（但在某些特殊情况下，图片版权可能遵循CC0协议，但你仍可自用和商用）

## 支持中文
更简单的体验 AI 艺术的魅力

## 在线画展
将自己的优秀作品投稿，或查看其他人的美妙作品

## 更多风格，艺术家，画面类型支持
油画，水墨画，铅笔画还是CG渲染？梵高，莫奈，毕加索，塞尚还是高更？你只需描述，AI自会创作。
PS：除你自己的幻想内容外，你还可以加入以下这些模型能处理的描述: 
“俯视视角”   （视角）
“清晰细节”、“木制纹理”     (细节和纹理)
“巨大的怪物占据了画面的一半”  (指定占据画面大小)
“灰色色调”    （色调）
“风格强烈的画面”          (描述画面的特点就对了)
“难以形容的恐怖怪物”  (说不清楚就这么干，有时会有意外之喜)
“1920年代”、“70年代中国画”      (年代)
“AfterEffect”、“Blender”、“3D Max”   (渲染/建模工具)

## 多款模型
6pen 支持包括 DiscoDiffusion, Stable Diffusion 在内的多款模型，并进行了底层优化和深度定制，兼具速度，质量和效果

## 获得收入
由你生成的作品，你可以设置付费下载原图或付费获得描述信息，以此获得收入，好的作品，这一定是值得的

## 参数支持
6pen 在简化了复杂的参数配置同时，支持了诸如图像尺寸（最高可达2K），参考图设定，随机种子设定等核心功能

## 技术信息返回
6pen 会将每次生成的技术信息，包括 Loss 曲线，随机种子，电量消耗，以及生成过程都记录并展示给你，便于你在AI艺术家的成长之路上更快精进

## prompts保护
prompts 保护，除非你设置为公开，否则你的 prompts 将只有你自己能看到



## 6pen是谁
6pen由面包多团队开发，后者是服务超过10万创作者的创作者经济平台。
作为面包多的产品经理，我在和平台的许多创作者的交流中了解到这个有趣的领域，我画画上是个菜鸡，但脑袋中经常会有很多不可思议的画面，我十分希望看到这些画面真的出现，于是对这个方向产生了极大的热情，并和团队成员一起，充满欢乐的制作了这个产品，希望也能将这份快乐带给你。
